channel.title: CVE Feed for civetweb_project -- civetweb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for civetweb_project -- civetweb

item.title: CVE-2020-27304|2024-08-04T16:11:36.691Z -- civetweb_project -- civetweb
item.description: The CivetWeb web library does not validate uploaded filepaths when running on an OS other than Windows, when using the built-in HTTP form-based file upload mechanism, via the mg_handle_form_request API. Web applications that use the file upload form handler, and use parts of the user-controlled filename in the output path, are susceptible to directory traversal
